TopicTitle: Mod to Transfer without leaving IVA?

Articles.Content: Is anyone aware of a mod that allows transferring from one command pod to another on connected vessels (like Command Module to LEM) without leaving IVA view?

Are you doing a "IVA only" flight or something?

If yes, where to? I'm curious.

I'm planning an IVA-only flight to Mun, or Minimus where I will rendezvous and dock with an orbiting space station. I've done [parts](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq9lqcKJzsOItreKT8RBilg/videos) of this before, but never both together. I want to figure out a way to transfer to a lander vehicle and go from the station down to the surface.
